price: Humo watapata wakitakacho, na kwetu yako ya ziada.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ
footnotes: Hao wachamngu watapata kila wakitakacho huko Peponi. Na Sisi tunazo neema za kuzidi kuliko yanayo mpitikia mtu kuyawaza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
